mapper.sql: a.`id` AS "id", a.`pid` AS "pid", a.`name` AS "name", a.`url` AS "url", a.`perms` AS "perms", a.`type` AS "type", a.`icon` AS "icon", a.`icon_color` AS "iconColor", a.`sort` AS "sort"
mapper.select:
select , p.name AS "pname" from sys_menu a left join sys_menu p on p.id=a.pid
and a.pid = #{pid}
and (a.name like concat("%", #{name}, "%") or p.name like concat("%", #{name}, "%") )
and a.id in (#menuIds)
and exists (select 1 from sys_role_menu b where b.role_id in(select role_id from sys_role_user where user_id=#{userId}) and b.menu_id=a.id)
select from sys_menu a where a.type!=2 order by sort asc
